name: MasterThought
description:
Try to create controlable superintelligent AI without eliminating the human race.

You will need to select the order in which to implement the different AI elements, into the AI core.

Be careful! Chossing some element to soon could result in a catastrophe!

The superintelligent AI is much smarter than us, and could very possibly be unpredictable. Keep it controllable.

If you manage to do it prefectly, the possibilities will be endless!

GOOD LUCK!

_____________________________________________________________________

This game was made during the GMTK GameJam 2020. The theme was "Out of Control".

I only had a few hours to work on it, so it is very minimal, but hopefully nice nonetheless :)
